page.title: 12LIFE STYLES 2
page.content: We spoke to a lady in the village of Weeley. She had been living in the same house in Weeley for 7\ years and preferred it to her previous home in Chelmsford. She liked to eat crisp sandwiches and fish and chips. She liked to watch Documentaries on T.V. She thinks that the Prime Minister, Margaret Thatcher is doing good in Britain. She also thinks that the prices in the village shops are high and so she does her main shopping in Colchester or Clacton. Her hobbies include sewing, knitting and cooking. She has two daughters and a son; they are all married and she is a Grandmother. She also likes going for walks, but dislikes rain and snowy weather. She likes Weeley and does not think there should be any changes made in the village.
